title: Sandstorm Released!
author: TJ
text: The Sandstorm makes its debut as the cover vehicle of the game!

title: Hammerhead Released!
author: TJ
text: A new heavy-hitter, the Hammerhead, joins the lineup.

title: Destruction!
author: TJ
text: Wreck your opponents using random junk that is around you!

title: Trick System
author: Tristan
text: Get air and show off your skills with the new in-game trick system.

title: Boost System
author: Tristan
text: Slice through the wind by boosting!

title: More Customisation
author: Tristan
text: Car too boring? Pimp up your ride with some of the new customisation options!

title: Paused Development
author: Tristan
text: Due to personal matters and technical issues, development has slowed down. We hope to come back soon!
